      • showBlurredBackground

        public void showBlurredBackground(java.lang.String imagePath,
                                  android.widget.ImageView imageView)
                           throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Loads the background bitmap and sets it to the image view. Blurs the image view and reveals it with alpha animation.
        Parameters:
        imagePath - path to the image file
        imageView - background image view
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if image file is not found at the specified path
